Follow Tower of Hanoi on Twitter Go to Tower of Hanoi's GitHub repo Go to Tower of Hanoi's CTF Time page

Tower of Hanoi is the CTF team of Politecnico di Milano. We are a group of students and alumni who share a passion for cybersecurity and computer science. We participate in CTF competitions and organize events to spread the culture of cybersecurity.

We are part of mhackeroni, a union of italian teams that participates in DEF CON CTF to qualify and compete in Las Vegas, among the world's best hacking teams.

Every now and then we organize Hackmeetings, events where we gather to share knowledge, work on projects and have fun together. Here's a picture of a typical hackmeeting:
